title: Crackshot枪械插件为什么这种武器不能加载
author: 老杨最帅
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 9999999999999 于 2020-2-11 14:56 编辑 

M4:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&3&n【突击步枪】&7M4-创世者"
        Item_Type: 277
        Item_Lore: "&a&n武器介绍|---------------------|&b&n武器伤害:&f&n25|&b&n爆头伤害:&f&n25|&b&n最大射程:&f&n70|&b&n弹夹容量:&f&n80|&b&n换弹速度:&f2.5秒|-----------------------|&6&n主动技能|&f&n[无]|&6&n被动技能|&f&n[射程强化][弹夹强化]|&4&n[稳定性强化][全属性强化]&4&n[冰属性攻击][PVE提升两倍]|---------------------|&a&n武器描述|&5据说这个是上古时期的神器|&5也是对新服开荒的限时武器|---------------------"
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 20
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Speed: 70
        Projectile_Type: arrow
        Remove_Arrows_On_Impact: true
        Removal_Or_Drag_Delay: true
        Projectile_Damage: 25
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Projectile_Flames: true
        Bullet_Spread: 1
        Sounds_Shoot: IRONGOLEM_HIT-1-2-0,SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0
    Ammo:
        Enable: true
        Ammo_Item_ID: 295
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: NOTE_PLING-1-2-0
        Sounds_Shoot_With_No_Ammo: NOTE_STICKS-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 80
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true 
        Reload_Bullets_Individually: true
        Reload_Duration: 25
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
    Headshot:
        Enable: true
        Bonus_Damage: 25
        Message_Shooter: "&e黄金爆头！"
        Message_Victim: "&c你被爆头了！！！"
        Particle_Player_Shoot: SMOKE
    Abilities:
        No_Fall_Damage: true
        Super_Effective: PLAYER-1.0,ZOMBIE-1.5
    Firearm_Action:
        Sound_Open: FIREWORK_BLAST-1-1-0
        Sound_Close: FIZZ-1-1-0,GLASS-1-1-0
    Custom_Death_Message:
        Normal: "&c<shooter>&5创世者&c<victim>!"
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Message_Victim: "&e你收到了伤害！"
        Message_Shooter: "&e成功命中目标"
        Sounds_Impact: ARROW_HIT-1-1-0
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0
        Sounds_Victim: DIG_WOOD-1-1-0

你想换弹时间是2.5秒的话要写成50    20=1S
